channel.title: CiTR -- Lions And Tigers and Bears (2007)
channel.description: An eclectic mix of indie pop, indie rock and underground hip hop. Always a surprise with the occasional interview or audio documentary.

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jan-2008

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Nov-2007
item.description: Liz and Jordie are back with new cohost AL! It's a 2 hour marathon of conflicting musical taste, sassy ladies and awesome times. And Neil Young.
item.itunes:subtitle: 2 hours of awesome! 20 minutes of songs about food!

item.title: Halloween Special and Tearful Bad-bye
item.itunes:subtitle: Nico's corpse visits Liv, Liz and Parm. Hilarity ensues?

item.title: mutual admiration society
item.description: Show is christened as "mutual admiration society" boys now allowed. OH!
item.itunes:subtitle: kate bush is funk for white people

item.itunes:subtitle: jordie returns for a fun drive! fun! parm is MIA (not like the sweet band)

item.title: Broadcast on Sept.24
item.description:
we made a big button with our faces on it!
LIV put it on her crotch!
we're gonna give it away during FUNDDRIVE!
item.itunes:subtitle: DEVOLUTION!!

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Sep-2007
item.description: ups and downs with liv,parm and liz. parmida gets wet about chet, liv drowns. liz loves shindig more than her mother.

item.title: LOLZ,
item.description: INDIE MUSIC IS SO FUNNY OMG!!!1

item.itunes:subtitle: technical difficulties abound! I try and mix two tracks from the same cd together multiple times! No one wins the contest!

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Jan-2007
item.itunes:subtitle: I am distracted all show because I am unsuccessfully attempting to play Alvin Lucier's "Sitting in a Room" stay tuned for it next week

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jan-2007
item.description: Jordie is hungover, but perks up towards the end. He plays the best of the year in no particular order. He also decides to write the summary in the third person, thinking it would be clever and then regrets it.
item.itunes:subtitle: the best of the year, Jordie is hungover
